name: Gearwaves
summary: Shopping platform with content administration and payments processing

name: Beatmon
summary: Social Networking Service for music producers
description: Social network designed for artists of the music industry. A place where a producer can share short snippets of his stuff, give and receive feedback from other producers. Built with React, Node.js and Firebase, with the capability of encoding/decoding, crop and upload wav and mp3 files right in the browser. Likes, comments, notifications and all the essential stuff of any social media service

name: Ixtlan Clothing
summary: E-Commerce platform with shopping cart and payments processing
